assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Department of Molecular & Human Genetics at Baylor College of Medicine receives revenue from clinical genetic testing completed at Baylor Genetics.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the institutional review board of Baylor College of Medicine (protocol H-47546) and was conducted in accordance with the ethical standards of this institution’s committee on human research and international standards.
